front.title: Framework for GMPLS and PCE Control of G.709 Optical Transport Networks

abstract.t: This document provides a framework for applying Generalized Mulit- Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) and the Path Computation Element (PCE) architecture to the control of G.709 Optical Transport Networks (OTN) as specified in the ITU-T G.709 recommendation, including the enhanced functionality in the recently consented revision. zhang Expires April 2010 [page 1] draft-zhang-ccamp-gmpls-g709-framework-00.txt October 2009
